* Contact Us


Contact Us
==========

If you are calling from outside the building, please dial 732-248 before all extensions listed below.

**The main number is 732-287-0900 or click on name to email.
Municipal offices are open from 8a to 4:30p Monday through Friday unless otherwise specified.**
